title: Leigh-Anne Pinnock sizzles in racy bikini top and hotpants
description: Leigh-Anne Pinnock sent temperatures soaring as she delivered a show-stopping performance at Boardmasters Festival on Friday.
content:
Leigh-Anne Pinnock sent temperatures soaring as she delivered a show-stopping performance at Boardmasters Festival on Friday.

The former Little Mix star, 32, commanded the stage in a daring red, green and black bikini-style top teamed with a fringed black mini skirt layered over tie-dye yellow hot pants.

The singer, who is carving out a sizzling solo career, completed the eye-popping look with fingerless green gloves, bright red Puma trainers and strands of ribbon flowing from her outfit in the colours of the Jamaican flag.

Clutching a bold red microphone, she strutted and danced energetically across the stage, whipping up the crowd with her fierce moves and commanding stage presence.

With her trademark curly hair tumbling freely over her shoulders, Leigh-Anne oozed confidence as she struck powerful poses mid-song, keeping the audience captivated from start to finish.

The OMG hitmaker has been gearing up to release brand-new music, after she revealed she had left record label Warner Music Group.

Leigh-Anne signed with Warner as a solo artist in 2022 and released her EP, No Hard Feelings, the following year.

But her solo career stalled after Warner 'wouldn't pay for a music video' for her last single after she reportedly 'failed to impress' with her other tracks.

More than a year later, Leigh-Anne revealed she was returning to music this summer - but had gone independent.

Posting on her TikTok, Leigh-Anne said: 'It's been a bit of a weird time, going through some stuff with my current label. It's a whole thing.

'I couldn't really say anything as well, so it seemed a bit "Where's Leigh-Anne? Where's the music? What's going on?" And I felt I couldn't really explain what was actually happening.'

She explained: 'Obviously I left my label and I'm now with Virgin. I'm fully independent guys eek! Like honestly, it's been the most amazing thing foor me, I think, I feel like it needed to happen to be honest.

'You think I've been in this industry for how long now? What's the point doing it if I'm not doing it my way? It just doesn't make sense, so that's all positive now and I feel really excited and really good.'

It comes after the singer looked every inch of the doting mum as she posed for a very sweet family photoshoot with husband Andre Gray and their two twins daughters.

The singer posted a carousel of Instagram snaps during their lavish holiday, covering her daughters' faces with a green heart emoji.

The family were captured looking joyful as the little ones, three, were playing around in the stunning park.

Leigh-Anne and the footballer, also 33, couldn't keep their hands off one another as they put on a smitten display in one snap.

The proud parents were then snapped holding hands with each one of the twin and giving them a gentle look.

'Did one of those cheesy family photoshoots on our hols girls of course loved every second,' she captioned her latest post.
summary: Former Little Mix star, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, delivered a show-stopping performance at Boardmasters Festival in a daring red, green and black bikini-style top and hotpants. She completed the look with fingerless green gloves, bright red Puma trainers and strands of ribbon. The 32-year-old singer, who is currently working on a solo career, has been preparing to release new music after leaving record label Warner Music Group. She signed with Warner in 2022 and released her EP, No Hard Feelings, the following year, but her solo career stalled due to lack of attention and a lack of a music video for her last single. A year ago, she announced she was returning to music, returning independent.
shortSummary: Leigh-Anne Pinnock dazzled audiences with a racy bikini top and hot pants, while promoting her independent music and family photos.

The former Little Mix star, now pursuing a solo career, is set to release new music after leaving her previous record label, Warner Music Group, and becoming independent with Virgin. In addition to her music endeavors, Pinnock recently shared heartwarming family moments with her husband and twin daughters on social media.
